name: Economic Surge

criticalSuccess.msg: A trade bonanza brings unexpected profits. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="2">Gain 2 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

success.msg: As critical success but you gain only <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

failure.msg: The economic surge slows for a bit; if you failed at this check on your previous Kingdom turn, the Economic Surge event ends.

criticalFailure.msg: The economic surge comes to an end.

resolution: This continuous event ends following either a critical failure or two consecutive failures on the check.
